name: Bling
description:
first of all while downloading ,the broswer might show warings.but there is no harm in downloading the file.plz ignore those messages. 

you are adin.

you are attacked by amvasians .

you have to collect chandrel power to survive.

left mouse button to shoot

right mouse button to teleport

P to pause the game

you can teleport when your chandler power is full.
